original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at Rs 327.90/328.20, bond yields stable
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 327.90/328.20 to the US dollar Monday, almost unchanged from 327.90/328.10 Friday, dealers said while bonds yields were stable.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.60/80 flat from 14.70/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.75/85 up from 14.75/80 percent. (Colombo/Nov20/2023)
